pkgmetadata.longdescription: US Beer Statistics from TTB // U.S. Department of the Treasury, Alcohol and Tobacco Tax and Trade Bureau (TTB) collects data and reports on monthly beer industry production and operations. This data package includes a collection of 10 years (2006 - 2015) worth of data on materials used at U.S. breweries in pounds reported by the Brewer's Report of Operations and the Quarterly Brewer's Report of Operations forms, ready for data analysis.
